metadata.name: Mirr.Or.Me
metadata.description:
“Imagination is the most important thing, it is a reflection of what we attract into our lives.”
(c) Albert Einstein

The collaborative artwork with AI artist Roope Rainisto and sound designer FAAF.
It expresses the connection between human dance movements and AI. 
Each viewer could find the reflection of his world in this work. 

Sales revenue will go to families and animal shelters that have been struggling with the war in Ukraine.

The buyer will get a high-resolution video file on demand HDQ 1079*1511.
